Interfaces

Interface LoggerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface LoggerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Logger interface to implement the stub for other entities.

    • Method Summary

        void updateTrack(int trackDistance,
                 int raceNumber)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Update the current Track distance and the race number
        Parameters:
        trackDistance - distance of the current track
        raceNumber - new race number
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                       int iteration,
                       int distance)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates the horse variables in a race
        Parameters:
        id - id of the horse
        iteration - number of iteration that the horse has made
        distance - distance that the horse has travelled
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • updateSpectatorBet

        void updateSpectatorBet(int id,
                        int betSel,
                        int betAmmount)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates the bet of a new spectator. The bet ammount will be automatically gathered from the spectator money
        Parameters:
        id - id of the spectator
        betSel - bet selection of the spectator
        betAmmount - ammount of the bet that the spectator has made
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        money - new money ammount
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • reportResults

        void reportResults(int[] horseIds,
                   int[] horsePositions)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Report the results of the race.
        Parameters:
        horseIds - id of the horses in the race
        horsePositions - position of the horses in the race
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
